choices: Zelda, Toon Link, Fox, and Lucas
Falco, King Dedede, Meta Knight, and Wario
1.content: Lucario entered SSBHQ, (along with hundreds of others), and looked at the massive face of the Nintendo CEO. "People of Super Smash Bros. Brawl, I have decided to hold a special form of tournament: SUMO Smash Bros Brawl! Look at the card-numbers. Here are your partners!" Lucario looked around for the people with numbers 8, 6, 14, and 42. They turned out to be:
1.title: Who's with Lucario?

11.content:
Lucario walked over to the group to introduce himself.

"Um... Hi," Lucario said, hesitatingly, "I'm Lucario. My number's 12. Do you guys have 8, 6, 14, and 42?"

"Oh god, no..." Kirby complained, "Don't tell me a noob is going to be our teammate?"

"Kirby," Mario said, "Be-a nice. You were new-a here also."

Then, directed to Lucario, Mario said, "Don't-a mind him. He's an idiot. Let me introduce ourselves. I'm-a Mario. The guy in-a the green tunic is Link. The pink ball is-a Kirby. And this yellow mouse-a here is Pikachu."

"Nice to meet all of you," Lucario said, "What are we supposed to do now?"

"Well-a," Mario thought aloud, "We just need to figure out who's-a going to be cooking for everyone."

"I don't follow," Lucario said.

"Well-a, one teammate from each-a team stays thin to cook for the rest of the teammates. Do you care if you gain or-a not?"

Lucario thought about it for a few moments, and then said, "Do we slim back down afterwords?"

"Of-a course," Mario replied.

"Then, I don't care."

"Well-a then, I guess that just-a leaves me and Link. I suggest we-a flip a coin."

"Winner cooks," Link said.

"Heads-a," Mario said.

He flung the coin up in the air, and it landed on the ground, showing...
11.title: Mario, Link, Kirby, and Pikachu

111.content:
"Best 2 outta 3?" Link asked.

"No-a way, Link," Mario replied, "I won, you-a lost, I cook-a, you-a eat."

"Fine," Link said, accepting his defeat, "But be warned, I brought my appetite this year."

"I think I'll-a survive," Mario said sarcastically.

-----------------------
15 minutes later
-----------------------

Everyone chose their cooks and lined up according to their team. When everyone got into position, several robots came out and went to each team.

"What're these?" Lucario asked.

"The newb doesn't even know what these robots are for!" Kirby said, sounding clearly ticked off.

Link gave him a stern look, and then said to Lucario, "These are ROBs, which stands for Robotic Operating Buddy. They take care of almost everything for us. They act as scales, timekeepers, and alarms. They can do almost anything except cook, which is why we have to choose someone of our team to cook for the rest of us."

Each individual ROB opened a small crevice in each of their heads and simultaneously said in a mechanical voice, "All cooks please put their ID cards in."

Mario, Snake, Fox, Donkey Kong, Captain Falcon, Luigi, and Wario all stepped forward and placed their ID cards into the crevice on the top of their team's respective ROB. After a few seconds of scanning the ID cards, they spit them back out, and all said, " Permit me to lead you to your room."

Each team split up to follow their ROB, each going down a different hallway. Lucario looked at each door that they passed. One read, "Control Room." Another said, "Training Grounds." Yet another one stated, "Brawl Chamber." Finally, they got to this one door that read, "Team 3's room." ROB opened this door, and allowed the rest to go inside.

The sight of this room made Lucario gasp. Everything from the furniture down to the wallpaper was extravagant.

There was a 50" Plasma screen on the opposite wall, equipped with a Nintendo Wii, and a giant couch in front of it, complete with a coffee table inbetween the two.

There was a large kitchen area, complete with a big Fridge, Stainless-steel oven, and pantry filled to the brim with food, along with a big dining area for meals and snacks.

There were several doors that each had the name of whoever was going to be sleeping in there. One for Mario, one for Link, one for Kirby, one for Pikachu, and one last one for Lucario.

Lucario had only a few seconds to look though, because Kirby said, "Jeese newb, I can't believe it. You walk into a new room, and you think it's God's Bedchamber!"

Pikachu started to charge up electricity when Mario said, "Pikachu, don't-a even think about it-a. We're all-a teammates here. And you-a don't hurt teammates-a." With that, Pikachu started to simmer down and turn off his attack.

ROB then went over to the center of the room. Then, the bottom part of his body started to come out from under him, and his eyes changed to look like some sort of number counter.

"What's he doing?" Lucario asked. "He's-a changing into a scale-a," Mario replied, "You see-a, every week, ROB has to-a take the weight of the-a Brawlers who are-a gaining. Each Brawler has to gain a minimum of-a 35 pounds each week to stay-a in the tournament. Right-a now, he's-a taking your starting weight."

Kirby was first to get on the scale. He put his ID card in, and ROB said, "Sir Kirby. Starting weight: 44 pounds." "Wow," he said, "I bulked up since last year." He hopped off, and Pikachu hopped on and put in his ID. And ROB said, "Sir Pikachu. Starting weight: 35 pounds." Pikachu looked at the rest of the team, as if to say, "That's going to change very soon."

Link got on the scale, and put in his ID. ROB said, "Sir Link, please take off your gear." "Excuse me?" Link asked. "We go through this-a every year Link, I think he knows your-a gear makes you heavier." Link grumbled to himself, then took off his boots, put down his sword and shield, and put everything that he'd been carrying over on the coffee table, which consisted of bombs, a boomerang, several tunics, a few pairs of gloves, and many pairs of boots. He then got back on ROB, who said, "Sir Link. Starting weight: 132 pounds."

Link got off the scale, and Lucario stepped on. He was a bit reluctant at first, but he put in his ID. ROB then said, "Sir Lucario. Starting weight: 86 pounds." With that, Lucario stepped off, and ROB went over to a small door on the side of the wall. It closed up, and then Mario said, "Well, who's-a hungry?" Link, Kirby, and Pikachu all said at the same time, "ME!" Lucario said, "Let me just go over and see my room. I want to get settled first."

"Fine-a," Mario said. Lucario went over to the door to his room, which opened by itself. He walked in, and saw that his room was just as fantastic as the living room. There was a huge bed, with blue sheets and pillows, showing that this was his bed. There was another television right in front of it, only not as huge as the one outside, but still pretty big. There were 2 more doors in there that each led to his own personal closet and bathroom. There was also a dresser in there for putting all of the stuff that he'd brought with him, with extra room for other things.

He put his suitcase on the bed, and started to unpack all of his stuff. "This is going to be the best 6 months of my life," he said to himself. Right when he finished, he heard Mario scream, "Lucario! It's-a time for dinner!"

With that, Lucario went out to have his first meal with his teammates.
111.title: Getting settled...

choices: Mario serves Butter Toast and Gravy.
Mario serves Panackes with loads of syrups.
Mario serves La La milk. (From Legend of Zelda Orcaine of Time)
1111.content:
At dinner everyone sat down at a dinner table and waited to be served. Mario came out and was carrying five plates.

"Who da order da pasta?" he asked serving each plate.

Lucario saw that the plates had pasta and meatballs on them.

"Bon apetuite," said Mario, "You-a may kiss the-a cheif."

Lucario, Link, Kirby, and Pikachu just stared at Mario for a second.

"Sorry everyone," apoligized Mario, "Its-a just that-a I served da pasta in-a Italy."

"Woah," said Link, "The resturant must been a five star."

"Yeah," said Mario, "Until uh...I-a took-a plumbing as a side-a job. Then-a one a night at da returnant, a da costumer found-a somthing that-a wasn't a spicy meatball................"

"You mean they ate a....." Kirby started.

"pika?" said Pikchu before fainting onto the ground.

"Lucario," said Mario, "Can you get-a him a up? We need-a gain enough-a pounds-a to make it to-a next week-a."

Lucario figured he would have to live with this kind of stuff for the rest of the tourment. He went to bed and then the next moring.............
1111.title: Mario da pasta

choices: Pikachu sitting on the toilet and nothing wrong. (He's out of toilet paper)
11111.content:
Lucario got up from bed.

He got onto the floor and yawn before he heard Mario, "BREAKFEST IS A SERVED!"

Lucario figured he best get going. He need to gain more pounds for next week. He went to the kichten and eveyone was already there. He sat down and was ready for breakfest.

"This-a one will-a put da pounds on ya." said Mario as he served.............Butter Toast and Gravy.

After a couple minutes of eating, Pikachu had to go to the little pokemon's room. He left the table and went away for a couple of minutes. Lucario got another peice of toast and was about to dip it in the gravy then all of a sudden........

"PIKA!" Pikachu shouted from the bathroom.

"PIKACHU!" Link shouted, "You ok?"

They crept to the bathroom and slowly opened to door. They then saw that..................
11111.title: Mario serves Butter Toast and Gravy.

111111.content:
Pikachu wasn't any where in the bathroom. Link looked behind the curtains to the shower. Mario check the cabintes. When they shearched everywhere, they gave up. Pikachu wasn't here for some reason.

"Well maybe he left the bathroom and is taking a nap right now." said Kirby.

Then they heard, "Pik--gargle-!"

"Oh no." Mario said worried, "This is not-a good."

Mario walked over to the toilet and grabbed the lid. He slowly lifted it up. When it was finally open, they peered down the toilet and saw...........PIKACHU'S TAIL AT THE BOTTOM OF THE BOWL!

"GOOD LORD OF HYRULE!" shouted Link.

"Quick-a!" shouted Mario, "Get-a me da plunger!"

Lucario passed Mario the plunger and Mario started plunging. He kept on plunging and plunging. Pikachu wasn't bunging.

"Everyone," said Mario, "Help-a me!"

Lucario and the others grabbed the plunger and started helping Mario. Then after serveal plunges somthing started to give. Then all of a sudden Pikachu came uncloged and flew arcoos the room. And land.............RIGHT ON LINK'S FACE!

"AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!" He screamed at the top of his lungs, while trying to pry the pokemon from his face.

Lucario then decide to.........
111111.title: PIKACHU FELL DOWN THE TOILET!

1111111.content:
use the plunger. Lucario picked up the plunger and put it on Link's face. He tried and tried then finally Pikachu went flying. He landed right into the bathtube.

"pika," mumbled Pikachu.

"Well-a with-a that out of da way," said Mario, "Everyone go-a eat ta breakfeast."

Lucario went back to the table and finished his breakfeast. Then it was time for them to head for there first match. They went to a big staduim. They took there seats. Lucario looked around and everyone in the competition. He saw alot of diffrent people. A blue hedgehog and a guy who looks like Mario, but green. Lucario then saw __________ come to annconce the beginning of the tourment.
1111111.title: use the plunger.

1112.content:
Lucario plopped himself on the bed after an hour of intense non-stop spaghetti eating, his belly was potruding about a inch and he was just about ready to burst!

Mario had made gitantic bowls of spaghetti for everyone, but Kirby's was at least twice the size of everyone else's pile. Although kirby just sucked up the whole thing like it was nothing and even had seconds. And yet it didn't look like he had gained any weight.

Lucario heard a loud belch and looked up to see a bloated Link rubbing his belly enter the room, "Man I haven't eaten that much in my life." Link groaned and sat on the bed. Link's belly stuck out a good inch in front of him but his belt was constricting it from coming out further. He appeared to be trying to take off his belt but it seemed to by too tight, finally he gave up and lied down on the bed massaging his belly.

"Pika," Moaned Pikachu as he entered the room. He appeared to have a bloated stomach and was dragging it as he walked.

"What are you guys on, diets?," Said Mario coming into the room, "No one but-a Kirby finished his meal."

Lucario spoke up, "Give us a break Mario, I'm a Pokemon not a pig!"

"Pika!" Agreed Pikachu.

"Besides, Kirby is a bottomless pit!"

"You say that like it's a bad thing!" Kirby interupted and opened up the pantry and fridge. "Now which one of you noobs is going to help me empty this pantry?"

Link bolted up in surprise, "Are you seriously still hungry?"

"Ya, why? You noobs seriously already full?"

Lucario chimed in, "I've eaten so much I think I might explode!"

"Look noob, I'm not sure if you know this or not but the robots come in and restock this room everyday! If we want to win we have to be effeciant with our weight, so are you going to eat or not?"
1112.title: After dinner...

choices: Attempt to eat more than Kirby
11121.content:
Link groans and manages to sit up, "I guess I can still fit a little more into me."

"I guess I will too, considering I'm going to have to be twice the size of a snorlax if I want to win this thing." Said Lucario raising a lazy arm.

Kirby rolls his eyes and chucks a spongecake at link and Lucario. Link unwrapps the plastic and shoves it into his mouth and swallows it whole, "Hey what-a ya know? I didn't-" Link's face turns red as he looks down at his belt. There is a loud tearing noise- and links belt bursts off as his belly swells to another three inches out of his tunic. "Nevermind," groans Link as he collapses onto the bed again.

Kirby bursts out laughing and falls onto the ground pointing at link for 20 seconds.

"Well that was entertaining," Giggled Kirby, grabbing a handful of the spongecakes and tossing them at Lucario, "Here have these and try not to explode like Peter Pan over there."

Link startle to rebuttal but all that came out was a loud belch and he laid back down.

"Wait, you get the whole pantry and all I get are your leftovers!?" Yelled Lucario getting quite pissed at Kirby's cockiness.

"Ugh, you are such a noob! First of all, you only ate three plates of the spaghetti while the yellow rodent ate five. Second I'm the smallest so I have to eat more to catch up to you guys. And third you it would take you untill two in the morning to finish all this while it would take me like five seconds! But if you do think that eating the same amount as everyone else is important, go right ahead"
11121.title: Lucario eats...

111211.content:
"You know what?" Lucario snapped, "I bet I can eat more than you!"
"Oh, do I smell a competition, noob?" Kirby replied.
"I believe you do!" They began to eat the pastries. Lucario ate one by one, while Kirby just sucked them in and swalled them whole. Kirby's weight didn't change at all, while Lucario gained about 9 pounds before he felt ready to blow up. "Ooohhhh..."
"I knew you couldn't eat more than me," Kirby said, "Besides, you need to gain more."
"I can't eat another bite..." Kirby decided to...
111211.title: Attempt to eat more than Kirby

choices: During the night "what was that!" said Lucario
111212.content:
"ah screw it I'll just eat this"said Lucario
"thats what I thought noob"said Kirby
"oh god I think those sponge cakes are going to come out the wrong end"said Link
"pika pika"said Pikachu as if to agree with Link
"now a you guys a know where the bath-a-room a is-a if you a need to use it-a"said Mario
"but try not too" he added quickly
Kirby then left the room to go raid the fridge or order some more food
"hey Link can I ask you a Question"said Lucario
"sure,why not"said Link
"Is Kurby always such a jerk"said Lucario
"sometimes only when there are new people to this sumo brawling thing"said Link
"ok thanks,one other question is it hard to sumo brawl"said Lucario
"it's not thats its hard you just feel really well...fat I guess"said Link
"oh well thanks for that ...information"said Lucario
"everyone it is now time to go to sleep" announced R.O.B
"o-a-k everyone it's a now time to go to a sleep a "said Mario
"thanks for stateing the obiovious"said Link
then the soon to be sumos went to bed
111212.title: Eat what he gave you.

11123.content:
Lucario could only let out a groan.

"Suit yourself." Kirby summoned a mighty tornado from his mouth, snagging every edible that came to him, bagged or canned. It all made his cheeks swell up before it was absorbed, Kirby remaining as small as ever.

This left Lucario in disbelief. "I don't get it. You're not getting any fatter even after all that food. How can you hope to win?"

Kirby walked over to Lucario's room. "Ya wanna know how I hope to win?" He looks in the door and reaches one pink arm into his mouth, pulling out a small bottle with a Smash logo-shaped cap. Inside was a dark thick liquid of an odd hue. "This! THIS is how I hope to win. And it only works for me, so don't get any ideas!" The confident pink ball walks to his designated room and hops to the knob to open before entering. "I'm gonna nap until there's food again! Don't wake me until then!"

It was pretty late, so they all agreed to resign for the night. Lucario's discomfort made it hard to sleep for a while, letting him wonder about what was in that curious bottle.

Now, when do you want this path to continue into?
11123.title: Kirby's Tiny Bottle

12.content:
The arena filled with the screams of a thousand cheering souls as the sea of various contenders looked at their cards. Lucario read through the list starting from one looking for the numbers he was paired with.

The first was Ness, the seemingly harmless boy who wielded strange, dangerous powers. The second was Pokemon trainer, Lucario didn't much care for him. He only seemed interested in letting his pokemon fight than himself. The third was the legendary soldier Solid Snake, a competition of stealth between him and Lucario would be quite tense. The last and most concerning was Samus Aran, the most famous bounty hunter in the Galaxy.

None of these would be easy opponents, and as Lucario marked every one of his selected his potential opponents MC Ballyhoo made his way to the front podium. The large monitor behind him flashed the logo of the smash brothers tournament.

"Alllll riiiiight, ladys and gentlemen!" His loud, overly cheerful voice rang over the cheers. "Let's see who will be squaring off against who!" The monitor filled with the images of each and every contender as they danced about sorting themselves.

Lucario somehow managed to finally find himself. His eyes trailed to the image next to him. He soon realized his next opponent would be...
12.title: Pokemon Trainer, Ness, Snake, Samus

123.content:
Lucario had his eyes shut as he heard the muffled cheering of the crowd. At the bottom of the large staircase he tapped his foot impatiently. He looked up as he heard the gate at the summit of the stairs rattle and open. Flying up the stairs, Lucario's world filled with brilliant white light as the roaring crowd blared in his ears.

As his eyes adjusted he took in the sight of the ocean of cheering spectators. He had to admit he wasn't much for exposure, yet even he could not deny the energy in the tremendous arena. Looking around he made his way along the narrow walkway up to the elevated platform when he noticed how oddly flat it was. Stranger still he saw his opponent had already entered the arena and was nodding casually as Ballyhoo jabbered at her. What could they possibly have to discuss. Lucario noticed just how beautiful the woman was. Samus was an imposing woman. With a strong jawline and strong features, she wore a toned, muscular build whilst somehow retaining a distinctly feminine body. Strangely enough she was neither in her power suit, nor her Zero suit. Instead she word a loose dark blue bra that seemed to be three sizes too large. That and a pair of, what seemed like a giant matching dark blue diaper. It was a large wrap around her waist, thick and far too big even for the mighty woman.

Foot slamming onto the open arena floor Samus and the announcer both turned. Samus looked at Lucario with a look of utter confidence, as if she just saw an ant enter her room. Lucario felt as if he were missing something important as he watched Ballyhoo scurry off of the arena. Samus held Lucario's attention as he expression of utter satisfaction seemed to glare right through him.

He did not like Samus, she was what many people would call... kind of a bitch. Being around her was much like being around a bear. She was imposing and did little to pay mind for those caught in her way. It seemed nobody truly seemed on the blonde woman's level. And yet whenever they stepped into the arena with her they found themselves again and again outdone. This puzzled Lucario all the more as he watched Samus cock her hip while trying to hike up her garments to remain decent.

Before he could ask what they hell she was thinking, BallyHoo's voice rang out on the speakers and the crowd cheered.

"Boooys and giiiiirls! Do we have a match for you! Lucario, the cunning fox warrior going up against what might be his greatest foe yet. The as of yet undefeated Samus Aran." Lucario twitched a bit at the last comment, trying not to admit it was true. "And we wish him the best because Samus rolled lucky this round!"

Lucario's heart skipped a beat as Samus smirked and pulled out a strange mushroom. Similar to one of Mario's mushrooms it had to large beady eyes on the stalk and a white cape save for a thick red 'T' over the top similar to the diaper Samus wore. Lucario's Eyes widened as he began to realize what he might go up against. The path behind him began to recede trapping him with what must be a very painful and slow demise. Samus on the other hand let her bright blue eyes glint as they took in Lucario's utter desperation. Her smile only grew sharper as she let him know how utterly mighty she was about to become. Ballyhoo rang in as the bounty hunter raised back her head and opened her mouth, the mushroom was tossed in the air.

"With out further ado... Sumo match begins... Now!"

The crowd roared with applause almost as if they were worshipping the blonde as she happily waited for the shroom fell to her pretty mouth. Lucario made a desperate leap towards his foe, hoping to take advantage of this. However the mushroom entered Samus' lips and with a gulp the mushroom defended into her stomach. Lucario ground to a halt in the center of the arena.

*Bubah Bump!*

Samus began to cackle as the tremendously heavy arena began to quiver and shake around her form. Her body heaving back and forth as she seemed to be beginning to break a sweat. Doubling over in what seemed like a mix of exertion, laughter, and pleasure her body began to grow. However despite making her taller as mushrooms did, only when the shadow of the amazonian bounty hunter began to widen did Lucario realize the horrible truth. Samus' body began to thicken as she grew larger. Her arms and shoulders began to bulge and swell as they expanded with tremendous amount of hard muscle mass coated in a smooth, round layer of fat. Two round shoulders gave her a very broad look as those sitting in the stands behind her gained a full view of her enormous back. Her muscles began to grow but they defied huge. They were beyond what one could image a large human could be. Rippling muscles coated under smooth, soft flesh lay utterly massive and unattainable even unflexed to anyone but her. To support her Lucario watched as the woman's thighs exploded like massive pillars of steel coated in soft body fat. They seemed to not even need to tense to support her enormous size. Just then Samus' stomach began to wobble as she continued to cackle. With a mighty shove of her hips towards Lucario her belly burst outward. Her admirers behind her reeling slightly as her butt ballooned outward, engulfing the blue thong between her titanic buttcheeks, each one three times the size of lucario. In all the woman grew so large her belly almost reached lucario at the center of the arena.

Hefting one mighty foot in the air, Lucario fell to his back as Samus slammed both feet dramatically on the ground. Chuckling at the apparent lack of effort. Her giant face hung over Lucario as the voice rang out.

"FIGHT!"
123.title: Samus Aran, with something special

choices: She decides to smother him some more.
1231.content:
Lucario stood in utter silence as the transformation ended. A ball of steel that was the giant woman's belly hovering over him making him feel like an infant looking at an adult. Covered in a wobbling layer of fat Samus giggled to herself as the terrible realization of just how badly Lucario was to be pulverized became apparent. His feet shaking, all his courage before the beautiful big bodied beast before him. He took no time turing to run in the opposite direction.

With a grin of utter satisfaction Samus hefted her mass in slow, powerful stomps pursuing Lucario. She let her enormity take up more and more of the punch-meat's escape routes. Lucario reached the brink of the arena when he felt his world go dark. He turned only to see the giant sumo lift her chubby, but terrifyingly strong foot over his head.

With a horrific slam, Lucario found himself struggling not to be smeared into paste under a wall of sweaty flesh. Samus smiled smugly over her prey, playing with him as she wriggled her toes over the helpless opponent. She rose her foot high in the air just long enough for the poor soul to open his eyes before her full crushing weight smashed into his helpless form. Her mass was tremendous and soon Lucario was nothing more than a paper-thin strip. Regardless Samus continued to sadistically stomp and grind her foot over the helpless smaller smasher. She took great delight in seeing her foe sticking to her sole as she peeled her opponent off.

One giant hand was all it took to hold the flattened Lucario in her clutches. The massive blue eyes of Samus glared into Lucario as he was entirely at her mercy. He tried to plead with his eyes, unable to speak for her to accept his surrender. But Samus simply crumpled him up in her hands like a note slip.

"Do you think you can escape me that easily?" Her cold, feminine tone boomed over the still flat Lucario.

"No, you are my bitch, and you will suffer like one until I feel you can leave." With that Samus pursed her lush lips and pressed them against Lucario. The smaller victim's world became once again smothered by the gurthsome goddess's flesh. Her lips pressed him hard before her belly swelled and she gave a mighty blow into Lucario, filling him with air and making him solid once more.

However this was hardly a sign of mercy as Samus used her powerful arms to toss Lucario to the ground. Stuck in the sand, Lucario meregerly could only watch as the towering blonde patted her enormous stomach. A grim realization hit Lucario as he watched the massive bounty hunter squat herself low before leaping high in the air. Though Samus was now indeed massive, nothing compared to watching her grow larger as she defended upon you, her shadow covering more and more of the world around you. Lucario screamed before the mountain of tummy smashed into him, the entire arena shook with tremors as the woman's girth crushed poor Lucario. There was a moment of silence as Samus rose to her feet, The once again flat Lucario stuck to her belly. She raised her arm and the arena burst into cheering.
1231.title: Lucario flees

choices: She keeps her size and dominates the tournament
She has to fight other sunos
12312.content:
Lucario could only hear the faint sound of the cheering as he found his paper-thin body plastered to the smooth belly. He knew it would be impossible to stop smelling like the giant woman's scent now. The weaker creature tried pitifully to pull himself free from the gigantic woman as she flexed and displayed her firm but massive body. With a loud laugh she patted her stomach letting the gigantic boulder of tummy wobble sending poor Lucario for a ride. Then out of no where a deep, dull rumble shook Lucario as Samus blushed,

Her stomach was growling.

The feeling of the girth some woman's belly sweat washing over him he felt a pang of utter dread as his Lumbering master peeled him off her smooth belly. Held tight within her iron grip he was held before her pretty, smiling face. He felt like he was being stared down by a shark.

"Well Lucario I hope you had as much fun as I did. I mean I don't care but I guess even a badass like me can be kind enough to give a token complement to her punch meat. Mmmm, meat." With a soft, womanly giggle amplified by her sheer mass the woman licked her lips.

"And if not then don't worry, with you only adding to my size there is PLENTY more fun on the way!" With that the crowd roared as the Terrified Lucario could only watch as the blonde lifted her head back and parted her soft lips. She sadistically let Lucario flail his arms in gains for a few moments before she finally released him.

With a hopeless yelp he smacked his waist into her soft lower lip and felt her powerful tongue smash into his head. The warm sticky appendage stuck to the side of his face and pulled him further into the maw as the lips sucked is helplessly struggling form into her mouth. Samus gave a cute hum of satisfaction as she sloshed Lucario around her mouth. She let herself stand before the stunned weaklings of the arena as she began to suck out the taste of her prey. She could not help but be reminded of some stories she had heard once long ago visiting a jungle planet about creatures who sadistically enjoy devouringing prey. Though she would never admit it, she began to see the appeal.

Meanwhile, Lucario was beginning to lose his flavor and soon he found the strong muscles of Samus' throat force him down her throat. The warm tunnel pushed and squeezed Lucario until he plummeted into a warm, wet, chamber. Samus let out an enormous burp of triumph as the crowd roared with cheers.
12312.title: She decides to eat Lucario.

choices: Sumo's Begin to Outgrow Their Tournament!
123122.content:
The majesty and magic of Smash mansion lay quiet and it's halls empty and bare. Though by some strange spell had become taller and much, much wider. There were no gatherings of heroes and villains from all over the multiverse to do battle for fun and glory. Those that remained hid. However two figures soon emerged frantically but cautiously making their way down the hall and through the mansion as quickly and quietly as they could be. Princess' Peach and Zelda scurried as fast as their heeled-feet would allow. The arising of the new sumo class of fighters may have thrown a wrench into the machinations of the tournament, but they were royalty, not rats.

All they same they had to scurry their small feet and cower behind anything they could find when a towering sumo made her way by. There was a match happening, thus they at least hoped there would be less to hide from. Peach looked frantically about her with a huff before slamming into Zelda who had stopped in front of her. She gave a quick "eep!" and instantly covered her mouth. "You hear that?" Zelda asked, Peach shook her head, still covering her mouth. Zelda pointed to the corner of the massive corridor. Moving through the house of giants Zelda hurried off with toadstool in tow. Zelda leaned up against the corner and told Peach to wait until she checked to see if anything was coming.

Immedietly a massive column of wobbling flesh stomped next to them. Zelda cursed Lucina's fat padded feet as the titanic girl towered over the mouse-sized princesses. Good for them they were so small the giant sumo-girl had not noticed them, but soon the massive legs spun the giant swords woman around as her wobbling tummy slid against the door to the laundry mat the royal duo were cast in the giantess sumo's shadow as she tossed her used underwear down right on top of them.

With a powerful thoom the princess's were trapped under a pile of smelly used underwear. Lucina reached around her for a key only to realize she forgot it. With a tired sigh she stomped off as Zelda and Peach pushed their way out of the pile and gasped for a fresh smell. They watched as Luncina's massive butt wobbled away, her panties swallowed much like the ones they were covered in had been. Made slightly woozy from the overwhelming scent of Lucina the two made their way into the cafeteria finally. Slipping under the massive door Peach practically leaped for joy as they saw massive tables of food bigger than their castles! Given that any smasher not given the Sumo-shroom was either crushed or eaten on sight, neither of the princess had any power to get food for themselves lest they became some. The two water no time in scurrying very much like mice towards the nearest and lowest table of food. The sumo's may have been gluttons but they sure new how to have a good time. All round them were stacks of pancakes topped in syrup and berries, waffles smothered in whipped cream and chocolate. Steaming eggs, bacon, sausage, giant fruit and massive towers of butter and toast. Zelda dived straight into the gravy-coated mashed potatoes while Peach gorged herself on some ham.

However the duo began to reap the rewards of their risk, Zelda found her little patch of heaven raise into the air. Peach began to look about for her friend only to have the giant slice of ham lift into the air. "Are you done? Honestly when I first saw you two ants scamper in here I thought I might enjoy watching you two try to get any food you could. But I think I get more pleasure burping then you did just now pests!." The massive, smirking face of Paultinia the goddess loomed over them as her fork mixed the ham with the mashed potatoes Zelda and Peach were stranded on. Without warning the green-haired goddess's bulbous cheeks let fourth a violent belch over the two and the goddess laughed. "Then again it is pretty fun having you two around. Without another word the fork was shoved into her mouth and the morsels devoured not even stopping to savor the taste as the fat god scooped up more food.

Her massive doughy ass planted on the ground Paultinia hefted one of her buttcheeks up with her hand and grunted, her mouth and belly stuffed. With a grunt she released a tempest of foul wind strong enough to knock over hyrule castle.
'Whew! How did that one taste galaxy girl? I need to lay off these beans!" Paultinia let out a laugh as the helpless Samus Aran, now stuck at her current size forever was only barely exposed from under the goddess's lifted buttcheeks. Paultinia smoked as she heard the Bounty hunter's whining before dropping her rump back down with a powerful thwomp, trapping her again with another fart of many to come. Letting out a great yawn of triumph, Paultinia flexed her immense and muscular back and arms. Yes despite being utterly gluttonous, her musculature and physical strength was greater than hurcules, as her massive biceps swelled with power, Paultinia thought of how much she will enjoy returning to being a goddess in her world, she couldn't even feel Samus kicking underneath her.
123122.title: She has to fight other Sumos

choices: He started to change his mind on the battling
13.content:
He started to go to the three people that seemed to be talking.

1. One was Pit. He had lite-brown hair and he had huge white wings. His weapon was a fancy bow which is two swords just together. His clothes was like some of the ninjas, slit shorts underneath, a white tunic that goes to his knees and goes over the slits, and also he had brown leather sandals.

2. Two was Jigglypuff. She looked like a round, puffy ball but she had sparkling eyes and had a ribbon to top.

3. Three was ROB. He is a Robot technically, but he had neat gadgets on him and his feet are actually wheels plus he can fly with just his jetpack that someone build him with.

4. Last but CERTAINLY not least is Sonic. He had blue fur with a tan chest. He was built for Speed alright, he was named " The Fastest Hedgehog in the World." His red and white shoes kinda complimented his fur and white gloves.

Lucario started to walk toward them without a saying, but Pit was the first one to notice.

" Hey, you joining us!?" Sonic had his thumbs up saying he will be alright with just a one word saying.

" it depends, do you guys have numbers 8,6,14, and 42?" Jigglypuff started to stop rolling.

" COOL, I'M NOT THE ONLY ONE!!!!" Lucario started to scratch his head, Sonic started to grin. " Cool a legendary, this will be fun."

Pit started to look at ROB, " Hey ROB, who do you think should battle first."

Sonic started to raise his hand. " I think Pit goes first!"


Jigglypuff started to get frustrated. " I think Lucario does it!!!"

Lucario started to get pretty spooked.

The agrument went on just for a few minutes.

PIT

LUCARIO

PIT

LUCARIO

" AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN"


ROB started to use his siren to stop the fight. " Thank god ROB, you stopped the fight good job, glad ya got that siren working."

ROB started to nod his metal head.

" Anyway so the choice is me or the legendary!"

Lucario didn't want to battle first but maybe he wants to do it third, so what can he say?"
13.title: Pit, Jigglypuff, Sonic, ROB

132.content:
" i vote for sonic going!"

Jigglypuff got pretty frustrated, but she thought later it will be a good idea..

" Ok now, who wants to be a cook?!" Pit announced. Sonic glared at him, " I can't cook! I know Cream can, but not me!"

" One down..." Lucario mused, Pit shakes his head..

" Two down.." Now it was ROB and Jigglypuff.

" Ok, let's do the coin toss like the Mario group, heads or tails?

Jigglypuff went for heads and ROB got tails

who won?

choices: checks in and gets his own room

checks in and grabs a bite to eat
1531.content:
It was another like any other. Once again Bowser got his butt kicked by the Mario Bros. and his friends. Bowser was frustrated that Peach decided to play him like a card and sabotage him behind his back like she always does. What Bowser needed to do now was to let off some steam. Fortunately for Bowser he would gain the opportunity to that and exact his revenge on the Mario Bros. and their friends. The opportunity arrived when Bowser Jr. came with news of the next Smash Bros. Tournament invites that he and the Koopalings had received.

Author's note:(This storyline will contain characters from Smash Bros. 4 and Melee along with any future characters, including DLC characters, based upon future releases of the Smash Bros. series.)

"Papa! We just got invites for the next Smash Bros. Tournament! There's even one for you too!" Bowser Jr. cheered as he handed his father the invitation.

Bowser start reading the invitation.

         Dear Bowser,
We are glad to invite you to this year's Smash Bros. Tournament. This year we will be adding a bit of sumo wrestling flare into this year's competition. We would be honored if you can make it and show us your fighting spirit. If you choose to compete we will provide you a place to stay for the duration of the tournament. The winner of this year's tournament will receive a secret grand prize. Get ready to rumble and to become the best of the best.

from,

The Smash Bros. Planning Committee.

A grin forms on Bowser's face after he read the letter. If this is true he'll finally get some well deserved payback on Mario and his friends.

"Pack your bags boys. We're going to that tournament."

"Already done Papa! We'll meet you by the interdimensional portal once you're ready." Bowser Jr. replied.

Bowser packs his bags and leaves for the tournament with his family. Once their Bowser...
1531.title: From Koopa King to Sumo King: The Beginning

choices: Three hours later Bowser is done
15313.content:
Once there Bowser checks in. After receiving his room key he proceeds to his room. Bowser was astonished by how large the door was when he arrived.

"So they weren't kidding. That door is ten times larger than the ones I have on my castle!"

Bowser opens the door to his room. and is amazed by the elaborate decorations and immense size of the room.

"Now this place is truly suited for a Koopa like me. Gwahahaha!"

Before Bowser could relax his stomach rumbled.

"Looks like I'm starving. Time to get some grub."

Bowser heads to the dining hall. He discovers that he is the only person there.

" It's chow time!" Bowser said as he stacked his plate high with various meats.

Little did he know that the food was spiked with an appetite stimulate that drastically lowers the colesteroll.
15313.title: Gorging like a King
